ygData.subject: Re:  Need  the site pls
ygData.msgSnippet: when you take shots in EQ, they will appear as bmp files in your EverQuest dtoirectory, and you can open em like that and save them as whatever file format you
ygData.messageBody:
when you take shots in EQ, they will appear as bmp files in your
EverQuest dtoirectory, and you can open em like that and save them as
whatever file format you want...i use paintshop pro 5, but anything that
can read bmp and change em to jpeg will work (:

The Scotts wrote:

> Okay guys I need a program a free one:)(preferabaly) that i can
> use to take screen shots in EQ with I downloaded UOSU a while ago and
> when i trie to take a screen shot i get an error message and a blasck
> screen. So if someone know a program ansd site(unless you have ICQ
> then you can just download the zipped program to me) or how to change
> the EQ's pics (using the "-") to jpeg for pls let em knwo alos thanks
> erveryone! Krix Mathar Guardians of Lore
